cause.description:
Please visit our website at www.childsplaycharity.org for complete information on how you can support Child's Play!
1. Improve the lives of sick children during their time in hospitals with video games and toys.
2. Be a philanthropic voice for video gamers, video game communities and the video game industry.
3. We see value in video games as therapeutic tools to Child Life and Physical Therapy specialists.
cause.mission: A video game industry charity dedicated to improving the lives of hospitalized children with toys and games in our worldwide network.
cause.name: Child's Play
